feature.label: UML Profile for EAI (Feature)
feature.description: UML Profile for Enterprise Application Integration (EAI). Provides a metadata interchange standard for information about accessing application interfaces. The goal is to simplify application integration by standardizing application metadata for invoking and translating application information. http://www.omg.org/technology/documents/formal/eai.htm
